briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Multiple Administration Regimens for Nivolumab Plus Ipilimumab in Subjects With Melanoma
officialTitle: Phase IIIb, Randomized, Study of Multiple Administration Regimens for Nivolumab Plus Ipilimumab in Subjects With Previously Untreated Unresectable or Metastatic Melanoma
summary: This is a safety and efficacy study of different administration regimens of nivolumab plus Ipilimumab in subjects with previously untreated, unresectable or metastatic melanoma.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Affected by Adverse Events (AEs) in the Broad Scope MedDRA Anaphylactic Reaction Standardized MedDRA Queries (SMQ)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Within 2 days from administration of any of the 4 doses in part 1 period (approximately 12 weeks)
